channel.title: Easy Money by clicking a link and waiting 30 seconds then getting 0.10 cents!
channel.description:
Ok i've tried about 5 ad sites for extra cash and got bored of them quick but google.com kicks ass. All I do is go on go to the surf tab and open up the webpages for 30 seconds and I get like .10 cents or something. I've racked up $5 in like a week. No proof of purchase yet because I havent bothered to cash out yet. I think there is a $10 minium untill you can cash out. I dont think you have to pay anything to cash out either :
They got a forum which shows proof of purchase also.
Um like refer me plx :help: < helps me out
google.com = bux . to
google.com/?r=coldbloodio
Link to site
google.com
oh yeah they got like some afterpay account shit or something so you got to create one to get paid I THINK they use paypal also dunno : [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] referal links are forbidden, even if they are indirect[/center]

item.title: Easy Money by clicking a link and waiting 30 seconds then getting 0.10 cents!
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

If you actually analyze how much time you spend clicking, and how much money you are making; Its actually a great loss of your time. It probably amounts to about 30cents per hour. You could be using your time a lot more wisely to gain qualifications.

Although if you were to make a bot to click the links thats another story.
